TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 735-736
TEI.2.document_title: James Small to Stephen F Austin, 01-13-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Small to Austin, January 13, 1832. Bill for attending a sick Mexican.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 735-736

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Small to Austin, January 13, 1832. Bill for attending a sick Mexican.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Colo *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir the amount of the inclosed account is not only half price for the Servises and attention I paid to the *person_mentioned*oald man */person_mentioned*you heard *person_mentioned*Doctor Miller*/person_mentioned* say that he could not Live over three days and that he could not attend on him any Longer you then asked me to Give him medison and do all that I could and you would pay me Stateing he was Exiled from his *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and it would be a pitty to Let the *person_mentioned*oald man */person_mentioned*Lay and die like a brute I attend on him day and night for the time Specified in my account which he was helpless as a child nearly all the time *person_mentioned*Mr. James Whiteside*/person_mentioned* who will hand you this Letter can inform you the Same and that I freecantly called on him to let me have some of his *person_mentioned*blacks */person_mentioned*to help wash and dress the *person_mentioned*oald man*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Colo Austin*/person_mentioned* I want my deed for my *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*and if you have a mind to pay my account fifteen dollars can go to you as *person_mentioned*commissioner*/person_mentioned*s fees for my deed and an order for the ballance in any store in town will answer your compliance with the above will oblige yours*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Small*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-13-1832">13 Jan 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Be So good as to inform me if the *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*I petitioned to government for was granted*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Small*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Inclosure]*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-12-1832">Jany 12 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Colo Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*James Small*/person_mentioned* Dr. by your assumption for taking care of *person_mentioned*Don Cevastian rodriges*/person_mentioned* one month - $30 00*/p*
*/div1*
